arid.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: arid land or an arid climate is very dry because it has very little rain
arid.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Water from the Great Lakes is pumped to arid regions.
arid.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: not having any new, interesting, or exciting features or qualities
arid.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: My mind was arid, all inspiration gone.
